casebody.data:
Steven MOORE, Petitioner
v.
WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SUNOCO, INC. (R & M)), Respondent Steven Moore
v.
Workers' Compensation Appeal Board (Sunoco, Inc. (R & M)) Cross Petition of: Sunoco, Inc. (R & M) No. 422 MAL 2018
No. 444 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 27, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
